thread.title: Motorcyclist dies after crash with car in Glendale Heights, police say - Wheaton Glen Ellyn
thread.title_full: Motorcyclist dies after crash with car in Glendale Heights, police say - Wheaton Glen Ellyn

author: Chicago Tribune
title: Motorcyclist dies after crash with car in Glendale Heights, police say - Wheaton Glen Ellyn
text:
Suburbs Wheaton Glen Ellyn Wheaton and Glen Ellyn News Motorcyclist dies after crash with car in Glendale Heights, police say Chicago Tribune staff , where he died from his injuries, according the news release. His name was not released. The driver of the car, a 69-year-old woman, suffered minor injuries but declined medical attention, police said.
Schmale Road was closed for about three hours after the crash. 
The crash was being investigated by Glendale Heights police with the assistance of the DuPage County Accident Reconstruction Team. 
Anyone with information is asked to call Glendale Heights police investigator at (630) 260-6070.
